product_name: MaryJanesFarm Organic Outrageous Outback Oatmeal - Single Serving
long_description: This tasty morning meal is made with soymilk, so it's perfect for for people who want a non-dairy hot cereal choice. Add your favorite fruit for added flavor and variety. Also doubles as a delicious trail or town snack you can carry in your pocket. Made with all-natural, organic ingredients. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
